nodes.text: Rezi-9 was an astronomical object located within the Rezi system, a part of the Outer Rim Territories' Bajic sector. Wesau T'orrin, an individual participating in the blaster skill event of the Galactic Games on the Mid Rim planet Euceron in 27 BBY, was from Rezi-9.

Rezi-9 was first mentioned in the 2002 young reader novel Jedi Quest: The Dangerous Games, which was authored by Jude Watson. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed the Rezi system, and therefore Rezi-9, in grid square P-17.
